snippet: Marco Polo del Nero, who faces charges in the FIFA scandal, has returned to his job as president of the Brazilian Football Confederation.
abstract: Brazilian Football Confederation president Marco Polo del Nero resumes his duties after three-month absence, despite facing corruption charges in FIFA scandal; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Marco Polo del Nero, who faces charges in the FIFA scandal, has returned to his job as president of the Brazilian Football Confederation.
